title: Should i get Slayer Jinx
body:
Hello! I mostly play adc and mainly Draven and Jinx, sometimes Lucian although I'm not really good with him. Today after the patch i got 6 skins with some random price reduction. I got Slayer Jinx for 1080 RP (20% off). It's also a legacy skin so do you think it's worth getting?
Thanks!
